channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- System x

item.title: CVE-2019-6157|2024-09-17T00:06:19.158Z -- lenovo -- system%20x
item.description: In various firmware versions of Lenovo System x, the integrated management module II (IMM2)'s first failure data capture (FFDC) includes the web server's private key in the generated log file for support.
